value:
Think I'd be a hit with the ladies if I
joined the Order of Heroes?
White really isn't my color, though.

I serve Lord Xander and will protect
him no matter what the cost.
Even if he chides me constantly.

Checking in on us? Why, thank you!
Let's you and I have a cup of tea
when your duties are done.

You and I should run off on a little
excursion at some point. I'd love to
take in all the sights while I'm here.

Ah! You caught me dancing! I'm just
practicing.$k$pBut you'll be the first to see
my moves when I'm ready,
$Nu.

Pardon me. Could I trouble you?
I'm here to extend greetings from
$Nf!

What a surge in power! Really, it's
almost too much.

If I keep this up, the ladies will
surely riot.

So little? How mortifying. I'll do
better next time.

Ah! You've made me stronger.
For that, I thank you.

I'm Laslow, a mercenary from the
Kingdom of Nohr. Shall we grab a cup
of tea? It's the perfect icebreaker!

Well, this must be fate! I was
just thinking about you, and here
you are, $Nu.$k$pThere's something I've been
wanting to share with you. But,
please, tell no one else.$k$pThis isn't the first time I've been
summoned from one world to
another. No, indeed.$k$pYou see, I came to this world
from Nohr—but I am not
really OF Nohr.$k$pI was summoned there from yet a
third world. I changed my look
and my name for Nohr.$k$pI needed to tell you because I don't
want there to be any secrets
between us, friend.$k$pMy real name is Inigo, and you have
my promise to always fight for
you—with a smile on my face!$k$pNow, how about you and I go run
off and grab a cup of tea?
はっ！
でぇい！
うあっ！
That hurts...
Right where I want you!
Shall we dance?
Until next time!
Don't make me laugh.
Sweet home—!
Heehee
I'm rather skilled as a dancer, you know.
I have to admit, I shy from a steady gaze.
I find that a smile brightens the darkest of days. Don't you?
Join me in a laugh? It's the best medicine. Ha ha!
The Order of Heroes has a fair share of exquisite creatures!
Where is my Lord Xander? He gets so cross if he thinks I'm lazing about.
How I enjoy our little tête-à-têtes. I hope to never leave your side.
OK!
Shall we?
I'll do my best.
